LanguageData.RimTalk_AttendedChildrenOuting.label: went on an outing
LanguageData.RimTalk_OrganizedChildrenOuting.label: led an outing
I went on an outing with the other children! It was so much fun exploring together.
LanguageData.RimTalk_OrganizedChildrenOuting.stages.0: I led the other children on an outing! Everyone had a great time.
